1999 South ACF Regionals Tournament

Texas A&M will host the 1999 ACF South Regional Tournament on its campus on Saturday, February 27, 1999. Registration will begin that morning between 8:00 & 8:30. Matches will begin promptly at 9:00 a.m.

Tournament Director of the ACF South Regionals will be Chris Romero. Questions may be addressed by telephone to Chris at (409) 847-1829. E-mail inquiries, which are preferred, may be sent to cromero@cs.tamu.edu.

Format will depend on the number of teams attending, however it will probably be round robin followed by playoff rounds.

Questions should follow the official ACF distribution and formatting, and should be sent to Dave Hamilton (dhamiltn@wam.umd.edu) no later than February 6. ONE PACKET PER SCHOOL (presumably from your best team), even if you're sending multiple teams. See the web pages. For more information on question formatting and subject matter, check out the documents section of the ACF website.

Fees

    Base fee: $90
    -$10 each additional team after first from a school.
    -$10 per working buzzer system, reserved in advance
    -$20 per experienced moderator, reserved in advance
    -$25 if you travel more than 500 miles to get to the tournament
    min fee $35

To register: Send an email with "ACF Tournament" in the subject line to cromero@cs.tamu.edu with all the applicable info (# of teams, discounts, etc).

Do not send question packets to Texas A&M; rather e-mail the questions, according to the given guidelines to Dave Hamilton at the address given above.

Checks may be made payable to Texas A&M College Bowl and sent to the address listed below:

Texas A&M College Bowl
c/o MSC NOVA
MSC-Student Programs Office   
Joe Routt Blvd.   
College Station, TX 77844

Thanks,
Chris Romero,
TD, ACF South Regionals
